column2:
# Broad Categories
perm <- how(nperm = 1000)
setBlocks(perm) <- with(broad.cover_wide, Tile.pair)

adonis2(formula= broad.cover_wide[17:21] ~ broad.cover_wide$Treatment, method="bray", by="margin", perm=perm)

Permutation test for adonis under reduced model
Marginal effects of terms
Blocks:  with(broad.cover_wide, Tile.pair) 
Permutation: free
Number of permutations: 1000
adonis2(formula = broad.cover_wide[17:21] ~ broad.cover_wide$Treatment, permutations = perm, method = "bray", by = "margin")
